Translations.Text: Va Iʙrohim ʙa padaru qavmaş guft: «Man az on cī şumo meparasted, ʙezoram
ƣajri on ki maro ofarida, ki Ū rohnamoijam xohad kard»
Va in suxanro dar farzandoni xud suxane pojanda kard, ʙoşad, ki ʙa Xudo ʙozgardand
Va Man inhovu padaronaşonro az zindagī ʙahramand kardam, to on goh ki haq va pajomʙare ravşangar ʙa sūjaşon omad
Cun haq ʙar onho oşkor şud, guftand: «In çodust va mo ʙa on imon nameovarem»
Guftand: «Caro in Qur'on ʙar marde az ʙuzurgmardoni on du deha nozil naşudaast?»

Ojo onon rahmati Parvardigoratro taqsim mekunand? Xol on ki mo ruzii onhoro dar in zindagii dunjo mijonaşon taqsim mekunem. Va ʙa'zero ʙa martaʙa ʙolotar az ʙa'ze digar qaror dodaem, to ʙa'ze ʙa'zi digarro ʙa xidmat girand. Va rahmati Parvardigorat az on cī onho çam' meovarand, ʙehtar ast
Va agar na on ʙud, ki hamai mardum jak ummat nameşudand, saqfhoi xonahoi kasonero, ki Xudoi rahmonro ʙovar nadorand, az nuqra mekardem va ʙar onho nardʙonhoe, menihodem, to ʙar on ʙolo ravand
Va ʙaroi xonahojaşon niz darhoe az nuqra mekardem va taxthoe, ki ʙar onho takja zanand
va az har guna zinat. Va hamai inho ʙahramandii nocizi dunjavist, hol on ki oxirat dar nazdi Parvardigori tu ʙaroi parhezgoron ast
